column1: Broadcast: Attention SAT Teams! Please investigate a mysterious force, and investigate the source of the signal now!
That's where the signal comes from!
Why is there a strange sound?
Why is there an extra room?
It seems to be a secret base for spacemen, what should I do?
I don't have SAT team gear right now.
But I still have this... oh no...
Being discovered by human beings can only take a leap of faith!
No one can stop Hoodonian's plans!
To attack me is to attack your fellow men!
The monster was previously hidden underground and was transformed by an alien laboratory.
Stupid earthlings, if you want to live, you will...
Break the rope on my left hand with a sniper rifle!
Just listen to him! Get ready to shoot!
This is the right hand! But it does not matter!
Captain, a strong energy signal has been detected in the garbage station!
Detected signal source in garbage station!
This machine must be maintaining the monster's energy!
Captain Li, you have other tasks.
Go to the Institute to view a report.
Hoodonian Plannet and Childirian Plannet are copies of the same planet in different parallel universes.
The invention of trans-universe technology sparked a war between two planets.
The purpose of the war is to compete for the Inocence-Crystal.
This crystal exists in life, so the war has affected many cosmic civilizations.
The Hoodonian were almost wiped out, and they came to Earth.
Ten years ago, they infiltrated Earth, waiting for an opportunity to fight back.
In order to avoid detection by the Childirian they overloaded the trans-universe machine.
Earth merges with another Earth in parallel universe
The fate of the earth has changed
The machine is broken, which sends out a super signal
Inocence-Crystals support the health, happiness, and longevity of life.
When the crystal energy of life is saturated, the next generation will be born.
The Hoodonian extract crystalline energy from the death, pain, and sickness of life.
And the Childirian through the massacre
The Hoodonian intensified their grabbing of crystals, which caused a lot of negative energy to happen on Earth.
The Childirian are about to attack the earth! Do the best protection!
Warning! UFO detected to reach Earth!
Let Ultraman come out and fight me!
Film it all! See how humanity perished!
There's an SAT member on the roof!
You can't beat me! If you surrender now...
Surrender is useless, I want to destroy you!
Don't dream of asking for help!
Earthlings must find all the crystal within 24 hours!
It was my command that was wrong. The high-level decided to collect crystals.
Captain, are we really going to give up?
You shouldn't ask me this question, you should ask yourself...
Paying homage to the team history memorial wall
Captain Li is driving a jet towards the crystal being transported!
SAT team, please fight with me to the last minute!
Mom, look! That man is Ultraman Warrior!
Mr. Ultraman, please accept the interview!
Reporter: Can humanity be saved this time? Tu: I don't know...but...
As a human, I will do my best to defend my home!
Ultraman, its energy is provided by crystals! Using crystals can make his energy exceed the limit!
But...if I detonate the Childirian with crystal...
Everything I have will be lost with the parallel universe, where will these memories be left in the universe?
It was like a dream, a heroic dream.
The reality of waking up has no monsters and aggression, only the normal life.
Maybe just a change of place…
As long as the passion remains the same...
